Who would have guessed that someone who pretends to be things that are not real would also lie about his race and pull an Elizabeth Warren?

A non-binary professor has resigned after he was accused of lying about his mixed-race black-indigenous “two-spirit” identity. And I am no expert, but one look at the guy should have told them that he was full of crap.

A non-binary associate professor of Women's Studies at @OregonState has qui
title: Non-Binary professor forced to resign, allegedly he faked his “Two-Spirit” identity

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

The Harris-Biden border crisis is so bad that one might argue it must be intentional, as no person or administration could be that incompetent. However, these suspicions might only be confirmed by the fact that Kamala called for a pathway to citizenship for all the illegal migrants she let in.

As president, I will bring back the border security bill that Donald Trump tanked, and I will sign it into law—and I will do the work to create an orderly and humane pathway to earned citizenship for hardworking
title: Watch: Kamala Harris makes it official what she plans to do with the illegals she let in (not deport them)
